resources:
Jieshuo+
Commentary Screenreader is a software that aims to making it easier for blind people to use Android-powered mobile phones more effectively. We have made some innovations in the human-machine interaction sphere. We know that fully understanding our software might take time, so we warmly encourage you to explore the settings to get help or contact us.
 Some functions are restricted and will only be unlocked after you purchase the full version of the program. For further details, please visit the official Telegram group.
 
 The most notable features of the program include:
 Voice assistant: type, chat with friends or use your mobile phone without even touching it.
 Plug-in system: gain endless possibilities with the advanced plug-in system. Either download ready-made plug-ins or create your own.
 List browsing mode, node browsing mode, automatic browsing mode, full-text browsing mode, granular browsing mode or character by character browsing mode: always find the content you need with these powerful navigation aids.
 Lift your finger to activate the item under it: rapidly navigate arround the interface, with no need to remember countless gestures.
 Custom sound schemes: always delight your ears with the sound scheme that suits you best.
 Copying and selection: always select and copy just what you need.
 Dynamic gestures: the program adapts to current on-screen conditions, choosing the most appropriate gesture scheme according to the situation you are in.
 Extensible custom gestures system: remap any possible gesture to your liking, create a completely new gesture scheme and share it with friends.
 Dual-voice engine: use two synthesizers at the same time so that unimportant content will never disturb your main reading.
 
 After purchasing the program, you gain access to the following features:
 Virtual screen: an inaccessible software is no longer an unsurmountable barrier. Open up a completely new world for yourself thanks to this feature.
 Automatic OCR recognition: wherever you touch, the OCR engine will accompany you to learn about even inaccessible data.
 Automatic message reading: automatically read messages from QQ, YY, Tiktok and many more.
 Automatic subtitle reading: watching foreign movies has never been easier! Automatically read video subtitles and make your life easier.
 CAPTCHA recognition: use the advanced AI features to recognize CAPTCHA images with lightning speed.
 Commentary Camera: Learn about scenes, images, people and text arround you.
 Web-content filtering: never let unimportant content disturb your reading. Filter images, advertisement texts and other unwanted elements.
 List copying: say goodbye to the tedious methods used to copy long lists. One click is enough to copy even the longest list.
 Article reading mode: automatic page turning, content filtering or background reading mode. Let Commentary Screenreader become your E-Book reader too.
 Per- gesture schemes: create gesture schemes just for one application. This feature offers endless possibilities.
 Favorites: collect frequently used content anytime, anywhere and access it easily.
 Granular editing mode: Edit the text by character, word, sentence or paragraph faster, and make all desired changes accurately.
 Full text selection: select by characters, words, sentences or paragraphs to copy the text just where you want.
 Custom voice commands: driven by the same engine that drives the plug-in system, endless possibilities of updating and adjusting the voice assistant await you.
 Self-launching plug-in system: automatically launch various plug-ins at the specified time intervals.
 Commentary Screenreader is as much ours as it is yours. Create your own Commentary experience with endless configuration options.
Hebei Biyou Technology Co., Ltd Commentary Screenreader is powered by some technologies like Tencent Youtu, Tencent AI, Baidu Voice, Baidu Translation, Baidu LBS, Baidu MTJ and Andro Lua +
Main menu
TTS rate Controls the rate of the currently selected TTS engine
Read usage hints Controls whether various useful hints related to the currently focused item are read or not
Haptic feedback Controls whether Commentary Screenreader uses haptics to provide information
Use the proximity sensor Controls whether speech is stopped when the proximity sensor is touched
Read notifications while the screen is locked Controls whether incoming notifications are read automatically even when the screen is locked
Sound feedback Controls whether Commentary Screenreader uses sounds to provide information
Read the focused list item's index Controls whether the currently focused item's index is read while navigating the list
use the node browsing mode Controls whether the node browsing mode is the default navigation mode
TTS volume ratio Controls the volume ratio between the currently selected TTS engine and the current media volume
Use the volume keys Controls whether the volume keys can be used as Commentary Screenreader's shortcut keys TTS voice Controls the currently selected voice synthesizer
TTS settings Feedback settings Reading settings Other settings

If the Wi-fi is disconnected, the TTS engine is switched back to the lower quality, offline engine Gesture scheme Full text editing mode Gesture scheme manager Automatically use OCR recognition Controls whether the OCR engine is used while an unlabelled item, a picture or any other inaccessible control is touched. Please note that multi-column menus do not support custom content Invert swiping gestures Read the list item's index Controls whether the swipe gestures are inverted for the default gesture scheme. When they are inverted, left and right swipes navigate by items while up and down swipes execute the shortcut actions 使用传统的上一个焦点移动方式 Commentary Screenreader posting board Use a single TTS engine Enable auto updater Automatically scroll pages Strict web content filter What's new Display the shortcut menu on long press Display unavailable actions in the shortcut menu Voice assistant and translation settings Automatically copy translation results to the clipboard Source language Controls whether pages are automatically scrolled when the last item of a multi-page view is reached Navigation settings Clicking action settings Shortcut keys settings Gesture scheme settings Controls whether clicking only once on the element activates it. 传统方式上一个焦点是下一个焦点的简单返回，取消后将使用新的上一个焦点方式，按照焦点层级返回，在一直向上浏览时更容易掌握内容所属关系 Controls whether the headset key is used to control the screenreader. The short press of the key moves the focus to the next item, a medium-length press activates the element under the focus, and finally the long press of the key activates the voice assistant List reading settings Label reading settings Dynamic content reading settings Content filtering settings Dynamic alert reading settings Controls whether the relationship data between elements is read in the node browsing mode. The information read consists of number of child elements the current node has, plus some additional, node-specific information. Controls whether the index of the currently focused list item is being read while navigating the list Controls whether the visual display range of the list is read automatically when scrolling commands are used Controls whether the window title is automatically read. If the window has no title, the first focusable element of the window is read instead Controls whether an unlabelled control's ID is being read while the control has no label Controls whether changes on the currently focused progress bar are being read automatically Controls whether changes in the currently focused item are read automatically Controls whether changes in the current window are automatically read Enabling this option might help fixing errors related to adding custom labels Controls whether images that don't contain the alternative descriptions should be filtered Controls whether the non-chinese content should be filtered out while browsing webpages Use edge gestures Swipe right from the left edge of the screen Swipe left from the right edge of the screen Recent applications Go back Controls whether the edge gestures are enabled. Edge gestures are swipes performed from the very left or right edge of the screen with either one or two fingers Allows to set the action to be triggered when the right swipe from the very left edge of the screen is performed Allows to set the action to be triggered when the left swipe from the very right edge of the screen is performed Voice assistant Long press of the volume down key Allows to set the action to be triggered when the volume down key is held Long press of the volume up key Allows to set the action to be triggered when the volume up key is held Toggle lifting finger from an element to activate it Controls whether the caller's name and number are being read automatically on an incoming call Read the caller's ID Controls whether the new volume is being read automatically when the volume is changed Read volume when changing Commentary Screenreader VIP QQ group Commentary Screenreader second QQ group Notification bar Home screen Swipe left from the right edge of the screen and hold Swipe right from the left edge of the screen and hold Allows to set the action to be triggered when the right swipe from the very left edge of the screen is performed and the final position is held for one second Allows to set the action to be triggered when the left swipe from the very right edge of the screen is performed and the final position is held for one second Controls whether the shortcut menu is displayed when your finger stays on an element for a longer time Increase volume Short press of the volume up key Allows to set a custom action to be triggered when the volume up key is pressed while the finger is held on screen. By default, the volume is increased as always Decrease volume Short press of the volume down key Allows to set a custom action to be triggered when the volume down key is pressed while the finger is held on screen. By default, the volume is decreased as always Use ringtone volume for speaking Controls whether the ringtone volume should be used for reading the incoming call screen Toggle gestures Allows to set the custom action to be triggered when the two volume keys are pressed simultaneously Simultaneous press of the two volume keys TTS engine Secondary TTS engine Allows to set a secondary TTS engine used for reading notifications and other secondary content. Setting the same engine as the main voice engine is equivalent to using just a single TTS engine Allows to set the main TTS engine used to read content. In case the TTS engine fails to read, the program will fall back on the next available TTS engine Timer manager Prevent killing the screenreader It is recommended to check this option if the screenreader is often killed by the system battery optimization mechanisms Automatically read incoming chat messages Controls whether incoming messages on the IM applications such as QQ or We Chat are automatically read Hang up|Reject|*Swipe left to decline*|End call|Hang up|Hang up the call|结束QQ通话|结束QQ电话|Decline voice call|Previous|Previous track|Navigate up|Cancel&Speaker Answer|*Swipe right to answer*|Speaker|Speaker phone|Answer a voice call|Next|Next track Edge gesture settings Left swipe shortcut settings Right swipe shortcut settings Queue notifications Controls whether the notifications should be queued for reading. When this option is enabled, notifications are read one by one as they come in,w hile when it is disabled, the previous notification is interrupted while the new one comes in. Please note that this option only works while the secondary TTS engine is active Frequently asked questions Landscape Portrait Automatically read the time Controls whether the time should be automatically read at the specified intervals Timer settings Open an URL Use voice dictation when holding your finger on the text box Append the text to the text box when using voice dictation

This option works only when Baidu is selected as the OCr engine Add from the currently focused element Add from virtual screen Add from the OCR recognition result Tencent Cloud (powered by the Accessibility Association) Chinese and English|Automatic|Japanese|Korean|Spanish|French|German|Portuguese|Vietnamese|Malay|Russian|Italian|Dutch|Svedish|Finnish|Danish|Norwegian|Hungarian|Thai|Latin|Arabic Description (15 or more characters) Scheduled tasks Users of the free version can schedule only one task Read webpage control type Controls whether all types of controls are announced on webpages. If the option is off, only the most important control types like links, headings and buttons are read Hour Minute I did not understand your message Calling Sent successfully This node already has a label. There is no need to add a custom label Label added Clicked Search on the web Send button not found Search in the application market Failed to add custom label Check permission status Setup wizard Check display pop-up window permission status Check ignore battery optimization permission status About Commentary Screenreader Check automatic startup permission status Check notification display permission status Permissions not granted Welcome to Commentary Screenreader! This software aims to help blind people use their phones more efficiently. Click on the "Setup wizard" to set basic settings of the screenreader, click on "Permission help" to view the privacy policy or click "Exit" to exit the program。 First, let's set the basic operation mode of the screenreader. By default, Commentary Screenreader uses the up swipe to move to the previous element, down swipe to move to the next element and left and right swipes to execute the so-called shortcuts. If you are used to more traditional screenreader operation, please choose the "Invert swipe gestures" option here. It should be noted that, when this change is applied, the up swipe will execute the so-called left shortcut, while the down swipe will execute the right shortcut. Now, please swipe down in order to find the option you wish to set, and double tap to activate it Next, let's decide whether you wish to receive usage hints from the screenreader. Usage hints are short messages spoken on any element. These messages can help you to operate a given control, but if you are already familiar with the screenreader operation, it is recommended to switch them off for faster experience. Do you wish to receive these hints? Lists are a very important part of the Android user interface. Now you will decide whether you want the screenreader to read various information about the current list, notably the index of the currently focused element, or the display range of the list. Do you wish this information to be read? Please select whether you want the screenreader to read notifications. Notifications include incoming SMS messages, weather forecasts, or any other information generated by your device. It is recommended to enable notifications, but if you don't want to be interrupted during your work, it is recommended to switch them off. It is worth noting that Commentary Screenreader has a feature called Notification Box, which might make it much easier to view notifications on some devices Commentary Screenreader can use two TTS engines at the same time. The main TTS engine will be used to read most of the information, while the secondary TTS engine will be used to read notifications and other less important content. It is recommended to use a single TTS engine if you are not used to this function yet. Invert swipe gestures Use default gestures Yes No Read notifications Don't read notifications Use a single TTS engine Use two TTS engines at the same time. Permission help 读取电话状态 用于确定身份的唯一性提供个性化服务与账户认证， 用于监听电话状态为快速接听/拒绝电话等功能提供状态信息， 用于来电报号。
 接听电话 在安卓8及更高系统提供快速接听/拒绝电话等功能。
 拨打电话 在提取号码和语音报号中提供直接拨打功能。
 位置信息 用于提供基于位置的个性化服务，如当地天气，当前位置及以后可能扩展的地图与导航服务。
 相机 用于拍照和各种识别功能。
 麦克风 语音助手，语音输入的录制音频。
 通讯录 语音拨打电话和来电报号时基于人名的服务。
 悬浮窗 显示菜单和黑屏模式的对话框和窗体。
 创建桌面快捷方式 为扩展工具（轻应用）提供添加到桌面方便启动的功能。
 应用内安装 用于自动升级。
 网络访问，用户验证，图片识别，云端标签，语音识别 。
 开机启动 为在重启后能第一时间提供服务。
 防止手机休眠 在语音播报时阻止屏幕关闭。
 禁用部分权限可能导致部分功能不能正常运行 Commentary Screenreader needs some basic permissions to work, for instance Storage permission is used to read sound schemes, extensions or any other external data from the device. Click on "Next" to continue and grant all required permissions, or click "Cancel" to exit the software Next The setup wizard has completed its work successfully Should you need to run the basic setup wizard again, go to General settings > Setup wizard Continue setup Basic permissions have not been granted Commentary Screenreader will not work without some basic permissions that you have not yet granted. Clicking on "Continue setup" will grant all required permissions and continue the setup wizard, clicking "Grant permissions" will grant all required permissions and exit the wizard, while clicking "Exit" will cause some features to work incorrectly Grant permissions and exit Notification display permission has not been granted Commentary Screenreader uses the notification display permissions for showing the notification icon used to resume gestures, using the killing prevention features, ETC. Granting this permission will help make the program more stable on your device Grant permission Notification display permission has been granted Changed Ignore battery optimization permission has not been granted Battery optimization can help to extend battery life, but it will cause the screenreader to shut down or hibernate unexpectedly. It is recommended to grant the ignore battery optimization permission for better stability, and use the dedicated power saving mode for extending battery life Ignore battery optimization permission has been granted Display pop-up window permission has not been granted Commentary screenreader uses the overlay windows for things like displaying menus, recognition results or for the curtain mode Display pop-up window permission has been granted Copy the user name and ID to clipboard 用户名 %s 用户ID %s dict.json Refresh %d results Read custom symbol definitions Custom symbol definitions settings Use the user dictionary User dictionary settings
